Package socialmedia

Interface SocialMediaPlatform

All Superinterfaces:
MiniSocialMediaPlatform, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BadSocialMedia
public interface SocialMediaPlatform
extends MiniSocialMediaPlatform
SocialMediaPlatform interface. This interface is a more elaborated version of the MiniSocialMediaPlatform. The no-argument constructor of a class implementing this interface should initialise the SocialMediaPlatform as an empty platform with no initial accounts nor posts within it. For Pair submissions.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Diogo Pacheco

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int createAccount​(java.lang.String handle, java.lang.String description)
    The method creates an account in the platform with the given handle and description.
    int getNumberOfAccounts()
    This method returns the current total number of accounts present in the platform.
    int getTotalCommentPosts()
    This method returns the current total number of comments posts present in the platform.
    int getTotalEndorsmentPosts()
    This method returns the current total number of endorsement posts present in the platform.
    int getTotalOriginalPosts()
    This method returns the current total number of original posts (i.e., disregarding endorsements and comments) present in the platform.
    void removeAccount​(java.lang.String handle)
    The method removes the account with the corresponding handle from the platform.
    void updateAccountDescription​(java.lang.String handle, java.lang.String description)
    The method updates the description of the account with the respective handle.

    Methods inherited from interface socialmedia.MiniSocialMediaPlatform

    changeAccountHandle, commentPost, createAccount, createPost, deletePost, endorsePost, erasePlatform, getMostEndorsedAccount, getMostEndorsedPost, loadPlatform, removeAccount, savePlatform, showAccount, showIndividualPost, showPostChildrenDetails

  • Method Details

    • createAccount

      int createAccount​(java.lang.String handle, java.lang.String description) throws IllegalHandleException, InvalidHandleException
      The method creates an account in the platform with the given handle and description.

      The state of this SocialMediaPlatform must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      handle - account's handle.
      description - account's description.
      Returns:
      the ID of the created account.
      Throws:
      IllegalHandleException - if the handle already exists in the platform.
      InvalidHandleException - if the new handle is empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.

    • removeAccount

      void removeAccount​(java.lang.String handle) throws HandleNotRecognisedException
      The method removes the account with the corresponding handle from the platform. When an account is removed, all of their posts and likes should also be removed.

      The state of this SocialMediaPlatform must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      handle - account's handle.
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle does not match to any account in the system.

    • updateAccountDescription

      void updateAccountDescription​(java.lang.String handle, java.lang.String description) throws HandleNotRecognisedException
      The method updates the description of the account with the respective handle.

      The state of this SocialMediaPlatform must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      handle - handle to identify the account.
      description - new text for description.
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle does not match to any account in the system.

    • getNumberOfAccounts

      int getNumberOfAccounts()
      This method returns the current total number of accounts present in the platform. Note, this is NOT the total number of accounts ever created since the current total should discount deletions.
      Returns:
      the total number of accounts in the platform.

    • getTotalOriginalPosts

      int getTotalOriginalPosts()
      This method returns the current total number of original posts (i.e., disregarding endorsements and comments) present in the platform. Note, this is NOT the total number of posts ever created since the current total should discount deletions.
      Returns:
      the total number of original posts in the platform.

    • getTotalEndorsmentPosts

      int getTotalEndorsmentPosts()
      This method returns the current total number of endorsement posts present in the platform. Note, this is NOT the total number of endorsements ever created since the current total should discount deletions.
      Returns:
      the total number of endorsement posts in the platform.

    • getTotalCommentPosts

      int getTotalCommentPosts()
      This method returns the current total number of comments posts present in the platform. Note, this is NOT the total number of comments ever created since the current total should discount deletions.
      Returns:
      the total number of comments posts in the platform.
